bibl.title: Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007. (American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition.)

publisher.orgName: The University of Michigan Library. Scholarly Publishing Office

bibl.biblScope: 1 frontispice coul., tabl., figg. n./bl. et coul.
bibl.note: The volume is dedicated to Traianos GAGOS (1960-2010). - Pp. xiii: Tr.G., Preface [with an addendum by A.H., Arthur VERHOOGT and Terry WILFONG]; - xv: Organization of the Congress; - xvii-xxvii: List of Participants; - xxix-xxxvi: Program of the Congress; - 789-793: Subject Index.
